Package system

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Worker
    The Interface Worker.
    Worker2Master
    Defines an interface to register remote (Worker) with the Master.
    Worker2Worker
    Interface for the workers to communicate between them
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Edge
    Represents the edge containing source and destination vertex along with their edge weight
    HealthManager
    Represents a thread which checks the health of the workers using heart beat and takes care of fault tolerance
    Master
    The Class Master.
    Message
    Represents the message to be sent between vertices
    Partition
    Represents the partition of a graph consisting of set of vertices and their outgoing edges
    Worker2WorkerProxy
    Represents a medium through which workers communicate with other workers
    WorkerData
    Represents the serialized worker data during checkpoint
    WorkerImpl
    Represents the computation node.
    WorkerProxy
    Represents a thread which is used by the master to talk to workers and vice-versa.
